attributes.action: give an immediate and legally binding undertaking to ensure that any compensation order in favour of the famillies of the victims of the Nimrod XV230 crash against the MOD should be paid by the 11 people who have been named in the Inquiry Report as having been the people who killed them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayer did not kill these members of the armed forces.  The people named in the inquiry report killed them.  The taxpayer should NOT pick up the tab for compensation.  The people, named in the inquiry report, who killed them should pay the compensation personally.  Anything less than that will  be a further travesty of justice and immoral and utterly devastating betrayal of the taxpayer by our pathetic political leaders - making the taxpayer pick up the tab for murderers!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
